title: Serious trouble is brewing at Monzo - will the digital bank ever make any money?
text:
It’s all well and good having brightly coloured bank cards which people love to use, but London’s financial technology firms have grown up to face a fundamental question: Can they actually make money from their legions of fans?

For years, all the signs have shown that customer appetite for branchless challenger banks is undimmed as they turn on the money taps. Monzo started referring customers to other companies offering savings products and nobody complained.

But it was Monzo’s plan to convert its three million customers into monthly subscribers that finally caused people to think twice.

This week, the start-up announced that it had scrapped its Monzo Plus membership scheme and moved the employees...
